title: Set of HOF Yellow Postcards complete through Stargell 200
author: bigfanNY

posts.post_title: Set of HOF Yellow Postcards complete through Stargell 200
posts.post_content:
I counted 200 Different Yellow Hall of fame postcards and the most recent is Willie Stargell so it looks like set is from 1988. Nice set perfect for getting signatures or just to have a card of everyone in HOF. 
Asking $50 shipped in USA.

Thanks for looking
Jonathan
